strings.something_went_wrong: Something went wrong, try to do the process again
strings.only_master_can_run: Only Bot Master can use this command
strings.only_admin_can_run: Only Administrators can use this command
strings.gdrive_credentials_created: *Credentials created with success!* Now, run *%1setupgdrive ok*
strings.gdrive_credentails_folder_error: Error on create credentials folder! (maybe this folder already exists?)
strings.gdrive_need2allow: Now, we need to get your Google Drive permissions, so, enter [here](%1)
strings.gdrive_localcurl: If you get a error when try to access localhost, type: *%1setupgdrive curltoken*
strings.gdrive_old_conf: Old config file detected, so we deleted, run this command again to setup new credentials!
strings.gdrive_how2setup: We need to configure your Google Drive Account in order to send files to Google Drive, so, please configure The setup is very easy, just enter here: [Google Drive Dev. API](https://developers.google.com/drive/api/v3/quickstart/java) Tap in *Enable the Drive API* Copy *Client Secret* and run this command: *%1setupgdrive mykey PasteYourClientSecretHere* After that, we need to get credentials, so, in the same page that you get Client Secret Tap on *DOWNLOAD CLIENT CONFIGURATION* save and open this file *Copy everything and run this command: %1setupgdrive json PasteFullJSONHere* Once you got that finished, just type *!setupgdrive ok* on this chat
strings.gdrive_config_file_make: *Config file created!* Proceed setup using *%1setupgdrive json YourJSONCredentialsHere*
strings.gdrive_localcurlinfo: To activate token manually, send url that gives you error! Do that by using: *%1setupgdrive url* Example: %1setupgdrive http://localhost:8888/Callback?4....
strings.egsi_allow_by_reply: To add permissions, reply to user that you wanna add permissions, by using *%1%2 allowuser*
strings.egsi_supported_types:
*GSI Type or URL is not valid!*
Supported types on Android 9: %1
Supported types on Android 10: %2
strings.d2g_file_sent: File sent to your Google Drive
strings.chkey_help: Current bot hotkey on this chat: *%1* *Supported Hotkeys: %2* To change hotkey on this group, run this command again, passing the desired hotkey *eg: %1chkey /*
